ability.name: Everyone Loves a Parade
ability.description: * Place any Minor Arcana on Everyone Loves a Parade. * Once a card has been played on Everyone Loves a Parade, the next card must be the same numerical value as the card on Everyone Loves a Parade. * When there are 2 cards on Everyone Loves a Parade: * every Adversary is forced to redraw the Intent that they would execute this turn. * gain 3 Shield. * discard all cards on Everyone Loves a Parade.
